creator: Reach plc
descriptionHtml:
Get the very latest Scottish news, football, sport, entertainment and opinion 24/7 all in the palm of your hand, brought to you by the best news team in Scotland.

Get the best news, pictures, video and opinion from the world of Scottish football. Our big-name sportswriters including Keith Jackson, Hugh Keevins and Gordon Waddell are backed by great columns from football greats Mark Hateley, Murdo MacLeod and Craig Burley.

Our other star lifestyle and advice writers include Tam Cowan, Coleen Noleen, Jackie Bird and Joan Burnie.

Completely customisable, the Daily Record App allows you to tailor what news you consume and when. You can even follow your Scottish football team whether that be Celtic or Rangers.

The Record app is the best way to follow breaking Scottish news, including live blogs and live video.

Keep up-to-date with the latest in:

· Top Scottish and World news stories
· Football and Sport news
· Celtic FC and Rangers coverage
· Road Record and motors news
· Celebrity news
· Scottish listings and What's On guides
· TV & Film news and reviews
descriptionShort: The brilliant and completely FREE Daily Record app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
It's been a while since our last release, but we have been very busy honest. Mostly this update improves a lot behind the scenes, fixing bugs and improving architecture. We have though, improved the Discover view, which now lets you see all your followed Authors and Tags along with your followed Topics. We even included a tutorial to show you how to follow Authors or Tags if you have never done so before. #StaySafe everyone
Tell us what you think: mobile_app_feedback@reachplc.com

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this release we have laid the foundations for Podcasts in the app - these will be available
shortly, and as usual we have fixed some bugs and improved the code to give you a super smooth
experience.

Tell us what you think: mobile_app_feedback@reachplc.com

descriptionShort: The brilliant and completely FREE Daily Record app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update marks big changes for User Accounts & Commenting. What does this mean for you?
You will be logged out of your account upon install, you will need to log back in again. We are sorry but this step is to ensure your data security. Forgot your details? You can use the Forgot Password feature to reset.
Commenting on articles is temporarily suspended and will be turned back on again soon, we are sorry but this is unavoidable due to the new user account security.

stable and silk smooth to use. We have still made changes you can see too, we have an all new
My Account section in Bottom Navigation now, to help you manage the app.
We have more in the pipeline, so stay tuned for future updates.

Get the very latest Scottish news, football, sport, entertainment and opinion 24/7 all in the palm of your hand, brought to you by the best news team in Scotland.

Get the best news, pictures, video and opinion from the world of Scottish football. Our big-name sportswriters including Keith Jackson, Hugh Keevins and Gordon Waddell are backed by great columns from football greats Mark Hateley, Murdo MacLeod and Craig Burley.

Our other star lifestyle and advice writers include Tam Cowan, Coleen Noleen, Jackie Bird and Joan Burnie.

Completely customisable, the Daily Record App allows you to tailor what news you consume and when. You can even follow your Scottish football team whether that be Celtic or Rangers.

The Record app is the best way to follow breaking Scottish news, including live blogs and live video.

Keep up-to-date with the latest in:

· Top Scottish and World news stories
· Football and Sport news
· Celtic FC and Rangers coverage
· Road Record and motors news
· Celebrity news
· Scottish listings and What's On guides
· TV & Film news and reviews
descriptionShort: The brilliant and completely FREE Daily Record app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This release is 99% under the hood changes and fixes. The development team are working really hard to bring the apps architecture
inline with modern practices and what that means for you is, we can push new features faster and more reliably in the future.

Tell us what you think: mobile_app_feedback@reachplc.com

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Our big update is finally here. Our design refresh includes an all new Home Feed divided into sections to improve the reading experience. A new My News tab where you can create a personalised news feed from your favourite topics.

Tell us what you think: mobile_app_feedback@reachplc.com

title:
Daily Record
8.1.1

creator: Reach plc
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to The Daily Record, your go-to app for the biggest Scottish, UK and world news. Immerse yourself in the latest news, sport, entertainment and more. Keep up to date with the world of politics, find out what’s happening on your favourite TV shows and follow celebrity stories, all in one place. With our user-friendly interface and comprehensive coverage, you'll never need to go anywhere else.

Stay Informed:
Get the latest breaking news, in-depth articles, and exclusive reports right at your fingertips. From news and sport to politics and entertainment, we’ve got you covered.

Live Sports Coverage:
Never miss a moment of the action with our extensive sports coverage. Get the latest team news, interviews, expert analysis and more.

Personalised Content:
Design your feed to fit you by selecting the topics you’re most interested in.

Interactive Features:
Share articles with friends, leave comments, and participate in polls to voice your opinions.

Breaking News Alerts:
Be the first to know about important news, updates, and events with our real-time push notifications. From breaking news stories to traffic updates, we'll keep you informed and connected.

Save For Later:
Save articles to read later, even when you're offline, so you can enjoy your news on the go, anytime.

Unlock The Daily Record Premium for the Full Experience

Unlimited articles
Never miss out on a top story with access to unlimited articles and exclusive content.

Ad-free browsing
Enjoy an uninterrupted reading experience with absolutely no ads.

Exclusive offers
Get access to exclusive deals and offers only available to our Premium members.

The Edit
A weekly curation of our best long reads selected by our editors.

The Digest
A specially curated round-up of the most important stories to catch you up on anything you might have missed.

Puzzles
Flex your mental muscles with our selection of puzzles including crosswords and sudoku.

Terms and Conditions
https://www.dailyrecord.co.uk/terms-conditions/

Privacy Notice
https://www.dailyrecord.co.uk/privacy-notice/
descriptionShort: Stay ahead of the headlines with The Daily Record.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Our big update is finally here. Our design refresh includes an all new Home Feed divided into sections to improve the reading experience. A new My News tab where you can create a personalised news feed from your favourite topics.

Tell us what you think: mobile_app_feedback@reachplc.com
